title: Woman seated at old school desks on the lawn take a break during an auction by eating pie served by ladies of White Cloud Kansas, near Troy. The auction was held by the Ma Hush Ka (White Cloud) Historical Society to raise funds for the local museum housed in the school building. The town was named after the last great Iowa Indian chief whose tribe was given land in the area by treaty in 1836.
